assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: LT Foods Limited engages in the milling, processing, marketing, storage, packing, and distribution of branded and non-branded basmati rice, and rice food products in India. The company provides basmati and non-basmati, brown, white, steamed, parboiled, organic, quick cooking, value added, jasmine, arborio, and flavored rice products. It also offers organic food products, such as rice, pulses, oil and oil seeds, cereal grains, spices, herbs, millets and sweeteners, and nuts; and rice-based snacks, sautÃ© sauces, and staples, as well as ready-to heat, fortified, and cuppa rice products. LT Foods Limited offers its food products primarily under the Daawat, Royal, Ecolife, Devaaya, 817 Elephant, Rozana, Gold Seal Indus Valley, Kari Kari, and Heritage brand names. It also distributes its products in the United States, the Middle East, Europe, and internationally. The company was formerly known as LT Overseas. LT Foods Limited was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Gurugram, India.
